text: agra agu'agesa eri antemrenerino mago'zana antahi ama nosie, hianagi agra mago arimpa osu nanekere agenoka nehuno, nanekegu ke hakare nehigeno, e'i anampinti'ma efore hiana rumofo zanku kesane nehuno, fra nevzino, rimpa oti'oti nehinkeno, vahe'ku huhaviza hunenteno, vahe antahi haviza hunenteno,
